title: All the requirements of sub regulation (4)of this Regulation shall apply to any ramp as they apply to a staircase
clause_text: All the requirements of sub regulation (4)of this Regulation shall apply to any ramp as they apply to a staircase. Ramps shall lead directly to outside open spaces at ground level or courtyards or other safe places.

source_pdf.text_snippet: All the requirements of sub regulation (4)of this Regulation shall apply to any ramp as they apply to a staircase.
